attributes.action: Insist all incomers agree to accept our culture and laws as predominant.
attributes.additional_details: Political correctness and the hate crime laws are now deterring the people of this country from objecting and there are far too many cases of indigenous people being penalised for speaking out against mass uncontrolled immigration. Those choosing to come and live here must accept our way of life or not come here at all. They must integrate and respect our culture and laws. We must stop criminalising those who deplore mass uncontrolled immigration and penalise non conforming immigrants instead.
attributes.background: Too many immigrants arrive here with a desire to inflict their customs, religions and laws on us when in fact they should accept and respect our way of life as we would have to accept theirs if we lived in their home countries. End discrimination against indigenous people.

rejection.details: If you wish to resubmit your petition with a cleat statement of what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take we will be able to reconsider your petition.
